name: Verify /auth/google endpoint returns 400 for null ID token

description: This test validates that the API returns 400 Bad Request when the ID token is null and includes an appropriate error message.

steps.name: Send POST request with null ID token to /auth/google endpoint
Attach API response to Allure report
Validate the 'error' field in the response
